value.title: Natives Queries or ODBC with Incremental Refresh in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!

value.title: RLS with TWO Fact tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you struggled with using Row-Level Security (RLS) on a dimension connected to two fact tables? Patrick looks at some options you can use to accomplish this in Power BI.  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Simulate Hierarchies with Field Parameters in Power BI
value.excerpt: Struggling with field parameters and hierarchies in Power BI? They just don't work! Patrick has an approach that looks to simulate hierarchies by using field parameters in this way. value.title: Test your Power BI DAX measures in DAX Studio

value.title: Using Images from a Database in Power BI
